Paragraph: CCB was reduced in WKY and SHR after LV administration of AVP during SN - induced hypotension .

| Disease |

| SHR (Salt-sensitive Hypertensive Rats) |

| SN-induced hypotension |

Note: AVP (Arginine Vasopressin) is a hormone and not a disease, so it was removed from the table.
